localised_text.tooltip_text: Options BROKEN BUTTON, WIP, DON'T BUG PLEASE

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse( FrontendRoot.IngameMessagingContext.IsReady, (begin_index = (this.ChildIndex - 1) * 3, items = FrontendRoot.IngameMessagingContext.FilteredNewsItems) => { items.Skip(begin_index).Take(GetIfElse(begin_index + 3 > items.Size, items.Size, begin_index + 3)) }, Generate(3))

component_text.text: The Trials of Fate offer the opportunity to win unique campaign items for your Daemon Prince. Test your battle prowess in a selection of well-known Total War: Warhammer battles reimagined within the twisted Realm of Tzeentch.
Use countless combinations of customisable battle settings to manipulate the laws of reality and create entirely unique battle experiences.
